text: Lanka Sathosa has revised the prices of following essential items yestertoday (2nd November).Samba rice1 kgRs. 78.00Nadu rice1kgRs. 74.00White raw rice1kgRs. 65.00Red lentils1kg Rs. 148.00Canned fish   425g Rs. 129.00Dry chilies    1kg Rs. 215.00Sprats - (Thai) 1kg Rs. 525.00B onion      1kg Rs. 167.00Potato        1kg Rs. 125.00White sugar   1kg Rs. 106.00
title: Prices of essential items revised
